com.buschmais.jqassistant.core.analysis.api.rule

Class AbstractRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buschmais.jqassistant.core.analysis.api.rule.AbstractRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Rule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Concept, Constraint, Metric

    public abstract class AbstractRule
extends Object
implements Rule
    Defines an abstract rule which is has an unique identifier and references a Query.
